files.patch: @@ -39,0 +39,6 @@ + * Warning: + * Serialized objects of this class will not be compatible with + * future Swing releases. The current serialization support is + * appropriate for short term storage or RMI between applications running + * the same version of Swing. As of 1.4, support for long term storage + * of all JavaBeans has been added to the java.beans package.

@@ -131,1 +131,9 @@ - *

Related Documentation

+ *

Swing's Serialization policy

+ * Warning: + * Serialized objects of this class will not be compatible with + * future Swing releases. The current serialization support is + * appropriate for short term storage or RMI between applications running + * the same version of Swing. As of 1.4, support for long term storage + * of all JavaBeans + * has been added to the java.beans package. + *

@@ -45,1 +45,7 @@ - * + * Warning: + * Serialized objects of this class will not be compatible with + * future Swing releases. The current serialization support is + * appropriate for short term storage or RMI between applications running + * the same version of Swing. As of 1.4, support for long term storage + * of all JavaBeans + * has been added to the java.beans package
